basic.description:
{Basic Eagle Eye}

60% chance to learn any spell up to 2nd level used in combat, increases enemies spell cost by 1 per level

advanced.description:
{Advanced Eagle Eye}

80% chance to learn any spell up to 3rd level used in combat, increases enemies spell cost by 1 per level

expert.description:
{Expert Eagle Eye}

100% chance to learn any spell up to 4th level used in combat, increases enemies spell cost by 1 per level
